name: Dream Ploy Will
description:
This is a 1V1 game, including round system, war chess, and strategy play. You can freely match your deck, command heroes, summon monsters, and release spells! Compete with game friends or strangers!

This is a 1V1 game, including round system, war chess, and strategy play. You can freely match your deck, command heroes, summon monsters, and release spells! Compete with game friends or strangers!

Introduction to play

1. Open card/secret card: two cards can be played each round, one open card and one secret card. Open cards can be seen by opponents, and dark cards need to be guessed
2. First hand/second hand: after the end of each round, the first hand/second hand will exchange, the first hand will play first and attack first; But the clear card of the first hand will also be seen by the second hand.
3.1 Fee/fee: two 1-fee cards or one 2-fee card can be played each round
4. Chessboard: The positions of both sides are 5X5 squares. Use the squares reasonably to maximize the strategic value!

Custom deck

You can match your card set freely

Hero

You can choose your hero freely

Real-time combat

Fight with friends or strangers in real time
